trans-unit.source: Converts objects to and from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte objetos de/para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do qual converter.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert an object of the specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> pode converter um objeto do tipo especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert the specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> puder converter o tipo especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />, caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> pode converter os seguintes tipos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para o qual converter.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> pode converter um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> no tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to the specified type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> puder converter um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> no tipo especificado, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method returns `true` if `destinationType` is <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> método `true` se `destinationType` é <xref:System.String> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece as informações de cultura que são usadas durante a conversão.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser convertido em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> pode converter os seguintes tipos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> para evitar lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> cannot be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> não pode ser convertido para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece as informações de cultura que são usadas durante a conversão.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to convert to another type.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> a ser convertido em outro tipo.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para o qual converter.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> especificado em um objeto do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto convertido.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> método antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> para evitar lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <paramref name="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> é <paramref name="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
